creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a shabby room with a Pancho Villa poster on wall in ULQ; stand with a telephone and hat at center; built-in cabinet at right with file boxes, stacks of papers and photographs on glass doors; same image as .49
portfolio: From Human Arts and Technology series
signed: on back in pencil: Blake Street / Berkeley / Joanne Leonard
title: Blake Street, Berkeley [?--Room with telephone, hat and Pancho Villa poster]
